## Key Finding 1
Here is an interactive plot.

```{r}
#| context: widget
# Let's make a simple interactive plot with plotly
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)

# Example using mtcars dataset
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  labs(title = "Car MPG vs Weight", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per Gallon")

# Make it interactive
ggplotly(p)
```
